summary: The latest episode of my podcast Better Offline is a conversation with Matt Stoller — America’s leading voice on monopoly and antitrust matters, and a thoughtful and prolific writer.  You can find Matt on Twitter here, and his newsletter here. It was a timely conversation...
title: Matt Stoller Explains Monopolies
